text: Sepedomerus is a genus of marsh flies (insects in the family Sciomyzidae). There are at least four described species in Sepedomerus. ==Species== *S. bipuncticeps (Malloch, 1933) :*S. bipuncticeps trinidadensis (Steyskal, 1951) *S. caeruleus (Melander, 1920) *S. macropus (Walker, 1849) (liverfluke snail predator fly) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * ==External links== * Category:Sciomyzidae Category:Sciomyzoidea genera
title: Sepedomerus
